name: The Haunted Mansion
overview: The classic Disney Theme Park attraction is making it's modern video game debut in The Haunted Mansion. In the famous house of wall-to-wall creeps and hot-and-cold running chills, you play as Zeke, a boy burdened with the unenviable task of putting 999 evil spirits to rest while trying to keep himself from becoming number 1000. Inspired by the both the ride and the 2003 motion picture, The Haunted Mansion's environments feature unique puzzles, secret passageways, and plenty of areas for you to run, jump, fight, and climb your way through the mansion. There's no turning back now.
